host.title: Hostname
host.description: The hostname or ip address of the MSSQL server

port.title: Port
port.description: The port of the MSSQL server

username.title: Username
username.description: The username to connect to the MSSQL server

password.title: Password
password.description: The password to connect to the MSSQL server

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: The protocol version to use for the connection to the MSSQL server

useEncryption.title: Use encryption
useEncryption.description: Use encryption for the connection to the MSSQL server

assumeUTC.title: Assume UTC
assumeUTC.description: Assume UTC values for the connection

connectTimeout.title: Connect timeout
connectTimeout.description: The number of milliseconds before the attempt to connect is considered failed

requestTimeout.title: Request timeout
requestTimeout.description: The number of milliseconds before a request is considered failed, or 0 for no timeout

cancelTimeout.title: Cancel timeout
cancelTimeout.description: The number of milliseconds before the cancel (abort) of a request is considered failed

maxPoolSize.title: Max pool size
maxPoolSize.description: The maximum number of connection mantained in the connection pool

connectionStrategy.description: If a connection attempt fails, retries will be performed with increasing delay (waiting time) in between. The following parameters control how these delays behave.

initialDelay.description: Delay (waiting time) of the first connection retry (in milliseconds). For subsequent retries, the delay will be increased according to the parameter incrementFactor which has a default value of 2.

maxDelay.description: Maximum delay (waiting time) to wait until the next retry (in milliseconds). The delay (waiting time) for any subsequent connection retry will not be larger than this value. Must be strictly greater than initialDelay.

incrementFactor.description: The factor used to increment initialDelay up to maxDelay. For example if initialDelay is set to 1000 and maxDelay to 5000 the values for the delay would be 1000, 2000, 4000, 5000.
